B&B Room

The Portesham

This cosy room has a country cottage feel and boasts views over our rear garden and the surrounding countryside. The luxury en-suite bathroom has an Ecosquare shower bath with an overhead shower, heated towel rail, and underfloor heating. Facilities include a HD satellite television, DVD player, tea and coffee making facilities, bottled water, and a hairdryer.

This room contains a large double bed.
